Text.val: 26.07.2010 SH SCR15605 BXA404A Removed some tests on BPIV_BTPC_LINENO
10.02.2010 SH SCR15325 BXA040A Replaced BTPC_DATCASHREPORT by
18.04.2006 SH SCR10965 Changed update of REPA_DATE from
13.03.2006 SH SCR10609 Added new module BXA404AA
01.02.2006 SH SCR10290 BXA404A Changes in part 3, according to direct payments
31.01.2006 SH SCR10256 BXA404A Changed Part3 <discount>/<deduction> parts
05.12.2005 SH SCR9685 BXA404A mult BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY values for XML with *-1
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Store user language, uses to switch back if report was produced in another
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
... get payment code for direct payments
-- Set system language to report language (= Cient language)
-- Build final XML File for client
...copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Uses also in further BXA404 steps
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :4 for fetch only

Text.val: -- calc total for XML, see T.S.
